component.name: Gnome client for Jami
component.summary: Jami is a software for secure communications with distributed architecture

description.p: Jami is a free and open source software, which allows to make encrypted audio or video calls and to send files and messages around the world. Jami is an official GNU package, that uses fully distributed architecture and independent from any centralized service. Additional support for SIP communications is provided.

Features:
Audio and video calls, instant messaging, file transfers

Multi-device support
Available on Windows, MacOS, iOS, GNU/Linux, Android and Android TV
